## OctreeNodeChunk.getNodeSize() method

Node size at this chunk level.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNodeSize(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The world-space edge length per cell in this chunk.

## Remarks

Represents the world-space edge length for a cell at this level.
